summary:
$XPOND - About Us

XPOND is the creation of the ever-forward thinking Elon Musk and the
relentlessly evolving world of cryptocurrencies.

It is not just another crypto-token, but an enchanting blend of technology,
memes, and the infamous 𝕏 – all crafted into an endearing symbol, XPOND.

Think of the story of Frankenstein and his Monster.
